attributes.action: Allow released hostages to sell their stories about their experience, regardless of being in the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who is held captive has a story to tell, and people want to hear those stories.  I fell that anyone who has been put through such a circumstance has the right to talk openly about it in the media, even if they are paid to do so, regardless of wether they are in the Armed Forces.  They have been through stressful and harrowing times, they should be allowed to receive payment, to spend as needed with their families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
